text: The 2020–21 Bundesliga was the 58th season of the German Bundesliga. It began on September 18, 2020, and ended on May 22, 2021. Bayern Munich are now the defending champions of the Fußball-Bundesliga of this season. ==Teams== A total of 18 teams will participate in the 2020–21 edition of the Bundesliga. ===Team changes=== Promoted from 2019–20 2.
